title: How to Draw a Never Ending House

steps.headline: On a blank piece of paper draw a square or rectangle.
steps.description: Use a ruler to ensure straight lines.

steps.headline: Draw a straight line that connects the top right corner to the bottom left corner and another line connecting the top left corner to the bottom right corner.
Where the "X" meets in the middle, draw a line straight until you reach the height you want the middle of your roof to be.
From the end of this line, draw a diagonal line down to the top left and right corner.
Erase the "X" and the line leading to the middle of your roof.
Draw a small dot pretty far away from your house.
steps.description: This will be your vanishing point.

steps.headline: Connect the bottom right corner, top right corner, and the top of your roof to this dot using your ruler.
Complete your drawing with doors, windows or colouring.

text: On a blank piece of paper draw a square or rectangle. Use a ruler to ensure straight lines. Draw a straight line that connects the top right corner to the bottom left corner and another line connecting the top left corner to the bottom right corner.  Where the "X" meets in the middle, draw a line straight until you reach the height you want the middle of your roof to be.  From the end of this line, draw a diagonal line down to the top left and right corner.  Erase the "X" and the line leading to the middle of your roof.  Draw a small dot pretty far away from your house. This will be your vanishing point. Connect the bottom right corner, top right corner, and the top of your roof to this dot using your ruler.  Complete your drawing with doors, windows or colouring.
sentences: On a blank piece of paper draw a square or rectangle.
Use a ruler to ensure straight lines.
Draw a straight line that connects the top right corner to the bottom left corner and another line connecting the top left corner to the bottom right corner.
Where the "X" meets in the middle, draw a line straight until you reach the height you want the middle of your roof to be.
From the end of this line, draw a diagonal line down to the top left and right corner.
Erase the "X" and the line leading to the middle of your roof.
Draw a small dot pretty far away from your house.
This will be your vanishing point.
Connect the bottom right corner, top right corner, and the top of your roof to this dot using your ruler.
Complete your drawing with doors, windows or colouring.
